title: Rust in 100 Seconds
description: Quick introduction to Rust by Fireship. Perfect for beginners wanting to understand what makes Rust special.

title: The Rust Programming Language Book
description: The official Rust documentation. Comprehensive guide covering all Rust concepts from basics to advanced topics.

title: Rust Crash Course
description: Complete Rust programming tutorial by Harkirat Singh. Learn Rust fundamentals in a structured way.

title: Rust Full Course - Build a CLI Project
description: Build a command line application in Rust. Hands-on project-based learning with practical examples.

title: Rust for Beginners
description: Step-by-step guide for beginners. Learn memory management, ownership model, and other core Rust concepts.

title: Rust Programming Masterclass
description: Advanced topics in Rust programming. Learn about concurrency, unsafe Rust, and systems programming fundamentals.

title: Go in 100 Seconds
description: A fast-paced overview of Go programming language by Fireship. Learn what makes Go ideal for performance and simplicity.

title: Learn Go with Tour of Go
description: Interactive official tutorial for Go by the creators. Perfect hands-on introduction to syntax and core concepts.

title: Go Crash Course
description: Beginner-friendly tutorial by Traversy Media. Covers Go setup, syntax, structs, goroutines, and more.

title: Python in 100 Seconds
description: Quick intro to Python by Fireship. Learn syntax, use cases, and ecosystem in just 100 seconds.

title: The Python Handbook
description: FreeCodeCamp's beginner to intermediate Python guide covering syntax, functions, OOP, and more.

title: Python Full Course for Beginners
description: A 4-hour Python course from Programming with Mosh. Covers all the basics with real-world examples.

title: JavaScript in 100 Seconds
description: Learn the core of JavaScript in 100 seconds. Covers syntax, dynamic typing, and the event loop.

title: JavaScript.info
description: In-depth modern JavaScript tutorial starting from the basics to advanced topics like closures and prototypal inheritance.

title: JavaScript Crash Course for Beginners
description: Full beginner crash course by Traversy Media. Learn variables, functions, DOM manipulation and more.

title: HTML in 100 Seconds
description: A super fast intro to HTML by Fireship. Great for total beginners starting web development.

title: HTML Full Course - Build a Website
description: HTML crash course by freeCodeCamp. Includes HTML basics and practical layout examples.

title: MDN Web Docs - HTML
description: The official Mozilla HTML documentation. Definitive reference and guide for modern HTML elements and usage.
